entry.title: Combined summary - Test away
entry.summary: Gavin Andresen, a Bitcoin developer, announced that he has successfully compiled and run the boost unit test skeleton code provided by Steve-from-the-Forum. This development now allows for more tests to be conducted with higher-level tests being encouraged. Gavin also mentioned that lack of testing resources for core Bitcoin is a significant weakness, and as such, he is seeking a QA test manager who would be interested in Bitcoin to put together a team that can help test Bitcoin and pull requests. Funding for this project can be arranged.
